title: What to do if peer has not allowed access and the deadline is over for peer review in Project 2

posts.author: SohamHaldar
posts.content: I had been accidentally given a duplicate peer and assigned a new peer on 10th April with the evaluation deadline being 11th April 11:59 PM. I had asked for access to the Google Sheet for question 1 however I have not been given any access and the deadline is up. What to do?

posts.author: 21f3000745
posts.content: Yes, same for me the links i got has not been accessed to me. I mailed regarding this. So i filled form for most of the peers. I was waiting for the response but didnt get any.

posts.author: carlton
SohamHaldar
posts.content: Yes sir, but therein lies the problem, this extra peer (atleast for me) did not give me access to his Google Sheets and now the deadline is over and I could not submit a blank Google form.
